description: men carrying large rocks up mountain with a city below and gods and goddesses above; in an elaborate frame with the sun at the top and moon at bottom; harp, horn, quiver and arrows, pen on top half of sides; vines around lower half of sides and across bottom and top
marks:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

below image i See Inscription
title: The giants attempt to scale Heaven by piling mountains on one another
